text: @narendramodi Again Death of 24 poor migrant labourers is not a simple road accident,it is the summary of several repeated wrong policies & inappropriate steps taken to control a Covid19 but created more trouble for millions of migrants & poor people across country. #PMModi #समय_रहते_पहचान_लो
